Title: The Super Decisive Battle Draws Near! The Ginyu Special-Squad Has Arrived!
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: Vegeta intercepts Krillin and Gohan on their mad dash to get powered up by the Eldest Namekian, but larger problems loom on the horizon. Brace yourselves for the arrival of the Ginyu Force!
